productcomparison.comparisonPageShowRati.title: Show Rating
productcomparison.comparisonPageShowRati.description: Check this box to include the rating section in the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageRatingLa.title: Rating Label - Comparison Page
productcomparison.comparisonPageRatingLa.description: Enter a label for the rating section of the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageShowPric.title: Show Price
productcomparison.comparisonPageShowPric.description: Check this box to include the price section in the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPagePriceLab.title: Price Label - Comparison Page
productcomparison.comparisonPagePriceLab.description: Enter a label for the price section of the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageRequireL.title: Requires Log In For Pricing Message - Comparison Page
productcomparison.comparisonPageRequireL.description: Determines the label for the link to the login page. This link only displays if you have checked the Require Login for Pricing field (located in the Shopping tab, Shopping Basics subtab of the Web Site Setup record). If you have checked the Require Login for Pricing field, but the Show Price field is cleared, then the link does not appear and the price does.

productcomparison.comparisonPageShowSKU.title: Show SKU
productcomparison.comparisonPageShowSKU.description: Check this box to include the SKU section in the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageSKULabel.title: SKU Label - Comparison Page
productcomparison.comparisonPageSKULabel.description: Enter a label for the SKU section of the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageShowAddT.title: Show Add To Cart Button
productcomparison.comparisonPageShowAddT.description: Check this box to include the Add to cart button in the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageAddToCar.title: Add to cart button label - Comparison Page
productcomparison.comparisonPageAddToCar.description: Enter a label for the Add to cart button in the comparison table.

productcomparison.comparisonPageRemoveIt.title: Remove Item Helper Text - Product Listing Page
productcomparison.comparisonPageRemoveIt.description: Enter a description for the option to remove an item from the comparison table.

productcomparison.itemFields.title: Item Fields - Comparison Page
productcomparison.itemFields.description: Add each field you want to display in the comparison chart. You can add both standard or custom fields.

fieldId.title: Field Id
fieldId.description: Sets the internal field ID of the field to display

label.title: Label
label.description: Sets the label for the field to display on the left side of the comparison chart.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Provides additional information about how the value displays.

group.title: Group
group.description: Determines the category under which the field will be listed in the comparison chart.
